verses.text: How long, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, wilt thou forget me \w for|strong="H1732"\w* ever? how long wilt thou hide \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* face from me?

\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* take counsel \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, having sorrow \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day? \w how|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w mine|strong="H4480"\w* enemy \w be|strong="H3068"\w* exalted \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w Consider|strong="H7896"\w* \add and \add*answer \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God: lighten \w mine|strong="H7311"\w* eyes, lest \w I|strong="H5704"\w* sleep \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \add sleep of \add*\w death|strong="H5315"\w*;

\w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* mine enemy say, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* prevailed \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6030"\w*; \add lest \add*mine adversaries rejoice \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* moved.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H1523"\w* thy mercy; \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H6862"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H1523"\w* thy salvation:

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w dealt|strong="H1580"\w* \w bountifully|strong="H1580"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
